website_summaries.verdict: A worthwhile step up from “free” 1040 EZ filing, though its walkthrough and explanations are more sparse than its Deluxe version.
pros: Includes all of the forms needed to file an individual federal tax return
Includes Schedule C. Users can easily pull up a form during the interview process to double check figures
Doesn’t pester users with upsell offers
cons: Lacks some of the in-depth explanations of certain tax rules provided in more expensive versions like Deluxe

customer_reviews.title: Save money as this BASIC software WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for the buck. I’ved used this BASIC software for years and it does my complicated taxes for $14.99 instead of buying the more expensive tax softwares :-). Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Terr W

customer_reviews.title: Misleading information!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy the Basic version, which doesn't include State Return!! In Q&A, I found: Q: How much extra does it cost to complete a state tax form with this Basic version? A: This product does include preparation of the federal and preparation of one state return. Additional state programs and state e-file are available for a fee. The state e-file fee is $19.95 per return. SO I purchased the Basic to do the State return only. But when I downloaded it, it only has the Federal Return. CHeating. No way to get it returned.
customer_reviews.author: dy307

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work!!!
customer_reviews.text: It sends to IRS, but then leaves you hanging! The next icon doesn't light up , so you don't know if you will get a refund or not and refund total doesn't upgrade, to show you the new figure???!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Burke WWII Vet

customer_reviews.title: Works Great on MAC
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this software package for years and know I can depend on it. Furthermore I can use it to do my father-in-laws taxes also.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon E

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointing
customer_reviews.text: i ordered this and the order is now pending. I cannot download it. If the product isn't available immediately it should be advertized as such.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: WORKS WITH MAC OS
customer_reviews.text: Unlike TurboTax, this software works with more than just the latest MAC OS. Simple, cheap and it works!
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: Tax preparation not such a chore with this program
customer_reviews.text: I come back to H&R Block every year and am well satisfied with their service.
customer_reviews.author: Donald M. Ricks

customer_reviews.title: A complete rip off
customer_reviews.text: Mac format pops up first for downloads and won't allow returns- a complete rip off
customer_reviews.author: merchantfan

customer_reviews.title: great price for what you get. q
customer_reviews.text: As long as you don't need to ask any questions the software works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: nathan jessup

customer_reviews.title: Worked great...
customer_reviews.text: Ran perfectly and updated without issue on macOS Mojave (10.14.6). Been using H&R Block tax software for years with no problems. Half the price of TurboTax and works just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Hidden fees - DO NOT USE HR BLOCK
customer_reviews.text: So they suck you in for a low fee, and then charge extras for state, and efiling and anything out of the ordinary. And there support is worthless, don't be sucked in by HR Black, try Turbo Tax or Tax Slayer, must better program and not all the extra fees
customer_reviews.author: Mike Z

customer_reviews.title: Bad customer support
customer_reviews.text: I bought the deluxe federal and state. I did my taxes and found the state wasn't there. they wanted me to buy it again. I tried calling customer service and even during non busy times they refused to speak with me. The automatic system said they were too busy and it just hung up on me. Later when I got it loaded after buying a second copy. It kept crashing and again I tried calling and no customer service. Do not buy this software. It is full of errors and they don't support it.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy consumer

customer_reviews.title: Refused to let me take an IRA deduction that the IRS allowed me to take.
customer_reviews.text: Locked me out of an IRA deduction I was eligible for. Not only did other software allow this, but so did the IRS. This software is CRAP! Caused me more time and trouble than it was worth. Would not use it again if it was free!
customer_reviews.author: Erudite

product_meta.title: H&R Block Tax Software Basic 2019 with 4% Refund Bonus Offer [Amazon Exclusive] [Mac Download]
product_meta.description:
Platform:Mac Download| Edition:BasicH&R Block Basic Tax Software offers everything simple for first-time tax filers needed to complete their federal taxes, including FREE tax advice via online chat.

Minimum System Requirements:

 * Operating System: 10.9 Mavericks
 * Processor: 32-bit
feature_bullets: Five free federal e-files and unlimited federal preparation and printing
Step-by-step Q&A and guidance on all available credits and deductions
Quickly import your W-2, 1099, 1098, last year's personal tax return
Free live product help via chat - or get tax help from a tax expert for a fee
Help Center has more than 13,000 articles, frequently asked questions, and tips in case you get stuck while preparing your taxes
Must allocate all or a portion of Federal refund to Amazon.com Gift Card to receive 4% Refund Bonus

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
